name: Dancing Space Cow
description:
You are working in a spaceship powered by a new revolutionary source of energy - sounds and music. Your job is simple, just move the capsule to the matching colour using The Gravity Munk™... Also you are in charge of generating the power for the ship. When it runs out you have to use the music control panel to make The Cow Munk™ dance changing its gravity using the The Gravity Munk™. Good luck and be happy!

Controls

arrows - move container and play music game

space - start music game

esc - pause

q or e - rotate camera to next minigame

top right is your battery

fill it up by playing the music game

top center is your score
